colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES 'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS PHYAG BZHI PA'I SGO NAS RIL SGRUB BYA TSUL YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SA YI TSANGS PA CHEN PO KHAL KHA SE CHEN WANG TSE RING BSAM 'GRUB NAS BKA' BSKUL GNANG BA'I DON BZHIN, 'JAM MGON BLA MA'I BSTAN PA LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA THOB PA'I SNGAGS 'CHANG RGAN PO BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS MI DBANG NYID KYI GUR SGANG STENG DU THUN GCIG LA SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
